response.overview: hot entirely on a tropical island paradise! --- Donna Bell and Alison are vacationing on Paradise Island - it is such a lovely place! They came for the sweet summer sweat, the shimmering light, and the wind in their hair! But soon they are prisoners in what could be heaven! When Donna finds herself in the middle of a midnight sex-feast on the beach, she sees that she can cum anytime she likes, but she can never leave!
response.title: Lost On Paradise Island
